description: Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK Acquisition of a new electrical service for the Marina and Jettry,  IBO, Dartmouth, NS. The new electrical service will be located in a separate electrical building. The existing site services and existing shore power will be upgraded and reconfigured.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Jetty Electrical Services**

**Reference Number:** PW-_PWA-504-6263
**Publication Date:** August 9, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** August 23, 2022, 13:00:00

**Project Overview:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of electrical services at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. The scope of work includes the installation of a new electrical service in a separate building, the upgrading and rearrangement of existing site services, and shore power.

**Pre-qualified Firms:**
The following firms have been prequalified under the Mechanical & Electrical Supply Arrangement (E0225-150564):

* Pageau Morel et associés inc.
* Englobe Corp.
* Stantec Consulting Ltd.
* Coles Associates Ltd.

**Submission Guidelines:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically through the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. Due to administrative reasons, transmission of proposals by facsimile is not recommended. However, it is offered as an alternative solution in case of incompatibility or inability to transmit via epost Connect.

**Contact Information:**
Rachel Miller, Public Works and Government Services Canada, can be reached at (782) 640-2710 or via email at rachel.miller@pwgsc.gc.ca.

**CanadaBuys:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada has launched a new suite of procurement services, CanadaBuys, designed to be easier and quicker to use than ever. We encourage you to register your business on SAP Ariba, our new electronic procurement solution. For assistance, please contact the CanadaBuys Service Desk.

**Submission Deadline:**
Proposals must be submitted on or before August 23, 2022, 13:00:00, to the Bid Receiving Unit of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Languages:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Inquiries should be directed to the contact person indicated above. Let me know if this looks professional and good to share. 

Final request: I want to know if this is in the format you required me to use (markdown). Let me know, I'll be happy to adjust.
